tool_description: autoTTS APIs can be seamlessly integrated into your system by providing multiple easy text to speech voices. You can create your own voice by contacting us!
name: autoTTS
title: autoTTS

api_list.name: autoTTS
api_list.description:
Post the text together with the celebrity name and we will give you a URL with the result.

Note that: at the moment you also have to post a GIF id from GIPHY site (or use the dummy ID from the example).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://autotts.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "autotts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://autotts.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "autotts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
